name: Shrimp & Scallop Stroganoff
author: VALARIE34
summary: Elegant comfort food, perfect for a dinner party!  A delicious simple seafood sauce with tender shrimp & scallops. Serve with egg noodles or white rice.
ingredients: 1 pound sea scallops, rinsed and drained
directions: Heat 1 tablespoon butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat
Stir in the mushrooms, and cook until golden
With a slotted spoon, remove mushrooms, and set aside
Melt remaining 1 tablespoon butter in the skillet, and stir in shrimp and scallops; cook, turning, until the shrimp are pink, about 3 minutes
With a slotted spoon, remove shrimp and scallops, and set aside
In a medium bowl, mix together the flour, black pepper, and clam juice
Pour clam juice mixture into the skillet, and bring to a boil
Reduce heat to medium-low, and simmer until mixture thickens
Reduce heat to low, and stir in sour cream
Return mushrooms, shrimp, and scallops to the skillet; mix in sherry, and cook to heat through
